addedtoqueue: You are offline; your operation has been added to the task queue.
areyousurereset: Are you sure you want to reset the application? All of your sites will be deleted.
audiorecordinstructions: Press Record to start the audio recording, Stop to stop and upload the file.
author: Author
cannotaddnote: Network not reachable. Your note has been saved in task queue; you can resend it once you are online.
cannotconnect: Cannot connect: Verify that your have typed correctly the URL and that your site uses Moodle 2.4 or later.
cannotconnectssl: Cannot connect: Verify that your have typed correctly the URL, your site uses Moodle 2.4 or later and the SSL certificate is valid.
cannotdownloadfiles: File downloading is disabled in your Mobile service, the app can't work with this setting disabled. Please, contact your site administrator.
cannotsendmessage: Network not reachable. Your message has been saved in task queue; you can resend it once you are online.
chooseaccountuploadfile: Choose an account to upload the file to
confirmcontinuedownload: Are you sure you want to continue downloading the file?
confirmdeletetask: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
confirmuploadfile: You are about to upload {$a}. Are you sure you want to continue?
confirmuploadfiletosite: Are you sure you want to upload this file to the site {$a}?
contactadd: Contact added to your phone contacts list
contentyetnotavailable: This type of activity is not yet available via the mobile app
deletesitefiles: Are you sure that you want to delete the downloaded files from this site?
enablenotificationscheck: You should check first if your Moodle site supports Mobile notifications, please open your Moodle site and go to Administration / My profile settings / Messaging. If Mobile Notifications are enabled you should see a column called Mobile Notifications
enablenotificationswarning: In order to enable notifications we need to store information like your mobile device model and operating system in the Moodle site.
enablesyncwifi: Allow sync only when on Wi-Fi
errorcameramsg: Device does not support a camera
errorlistingfiles: Error retrieving files from this directory
errornoconnectednocache: The device is not conected and there is not cached information available for the option requested
errorreceivefilenosites: There are no sites stored. Please add a site before trying to upload a file.
errorduringdevicetokenrequesttoapns: Error during device token request to APNS
forumnodiscussionsyet: There are no discussion topics yet in this forum
helpmelogin:
There are many thousands of Moodle sites around the world. This app can only connect to Moodle sites that have specifically enabled Mobile app access.

If you can't connect to your Moodle site then you need to contact a Moodle administrator at the place where you want to connect and ask them to read http://docs.moodle.org/en/Mobile_app

To test the app in a Moodle demo site type teacher or student in the Site URL field and click the Add button.
imagestored: Your image has been stored in your private area
invalidaccount: Please check your login details or ask your site administrator to check the site configuration.
invalidmoodleversion: Invalid Moodle version. The minium version required is:
invalidscheme: Please provide a valid site URL.
keepsynchronising: Keep synchronising posts from the server
lostconnection: We lost connection you need to reconnect. Your token is now invalid
logininsiterequired: You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
mobileservicesnotenabled: Mobile Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Moodle site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
name: Name
networkerrormsg: Network not enabled or not working.
norefreshdisconnected: The refresh option requires network connection
noticelargefile: Please note that the file you are requesting to download is large and may take some time to complete.
notificationsenabled: Notifications enabled for all your moodle sites
notificationpreferencesnotconfigured: Your mobile notification preferences are not yet configured. To do this log into your Moodle site using a web browser and go to the Messaging settings under your user profile.
rdebuggingenabledfor: Remote debugging will be enabled during the following seconds:
recordstored: Your recording has been stored in your private area
remotesystemnotconfiguredfornotification: The Moodle installation is not configured for sending mobile notifications. Please contact your Moodle administrator if you think notifications should be enabled.
reportbuginfo: Tap on the report a bug button for instructions.
requiredfields: All required fields must be completed.
siteinmaintenance: Your site is in maintenance mode
siteurlrequired: Site URL required, i.e http://www.yourmoodlesite.abc or https://www.yourmoodlesite.efg
unexpectederror: Unexepected error. Please close and reopen the application to try again
uploadfileinstructions: To upload a file, click the button below and choose the file you want to upload.
uploadingtoprivatefiles: Uploading to your private files area
uselocalmobileplugin: This page works better when the Moodle site has the optional Mobile plugin installed
videostored: Your video has been stored in your private area
webservicesnotenabled: Web Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Moodle site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
welcome: Welcome to the Moodle mobile app
writeherethebug: Write here a detailed description of the problem
activitynotyetviewable: This activity or resource is not yet viewable in the app.
activitynotyetviewablegothere: This activity or resource is not yet viewable in the app, click the button below to access it from the site.
admindisableddownload: Please note that your Moodle administrator disabled file downloads, you can browse through the files but not download them.
clicktoupload: Click the button below to upload files to your private files.
confirmdeletesite: Are you sure you want to delete the site {{sitename}}?
confirmuploadfile: You are about to upload {{size}}. Are you sure you want to continue?
couldnotloadfiles: The list of files could not be loaded.
couldnotloadsectioncontent: Could not load the section content, please try again later.
couldnotloadsections: Could not load the sections, please try again later.
credentialsdescription: Please provide your username and password to login on
detailsnotavailable: The details of this user are not available to you.
erroraccesscontrolalloworigin: The Cross-Origin call you're trying to perform has been rejected. Please check https://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_Mobile_development_using_Chrome_or_Chromium
errordeletesite: An error occurred while deleting this site. Please try again.
errorloadcourses: An error occurred while loading courses.
errorloadsite: An error occurred while loading this site. Please try again.
errormustbeonlinetoupload: You have to be online to upload files.
errornoapp: You don't have an app installed to perform this action.
errorupdatesite: An error ocurred while updating the site's token.
errorwhiledownloading: An error occured while trying to download the file.
errorwhileloadingthepage: Error while loading the page content.
errorwhilerecordingaudio: An error occured while trying to record audio.
errorwhileretrievingcontacts: Error while retrieving the contacts from the server.
errorwhileretrievingdiscussions: Error while retrieving the discussions from the server.
errorwhileretrievingmessages: Error while retrieving the messages from the server.
errorwhileuploading: An error occured during the file upload.
helpmeloginend: To test the app in a Moodle demo site type teacher or student in the Site URL field and click the Add button.
helpmeloginintro: There are many thousands of Moodle sites around the world. This app can only connect to Moodle sites that have specifically enabled Mobile app access.
helpmeloginmid: If you can't connect to your Moodle site then you need to contact a Moodle administrator at the place where you want to connect and ask them to read:
label: Label
messagenotsent: The message was not sent, please try again later.
mustbeonlinetosendmessages: You must be online to send messages
myprivatefilesdesc: The files that are available in your private area on this Moodle site.
newsitedescription: Please enter the URL of your Moodle site. Note that it might not be configured to work with this app.
nocontentavailable: No content available at the moment.
notloggedin: You need to be logged in.
reconnectdescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site.
reconnectssodescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site. You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
sitefilesdesc: The other files that are available to you on this Moodle site.
wsfunctionnotavailable: The webservice function is not available.
